title: Track fault causing delays on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #RafflesPlace and #MarinaBay are now operating normally.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #MarinaBay and #RafflesPlace has resumed. Trains will be traveling slower.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train service between #RafflesPlace and #MarinaBay on both bounds due to track fault. Estimate resuming time is 1540 hrs.
[NSL]: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time between #RafflesPlace and #MarinaBay due to track fault.
